content.rendered:
Directed by Kanishk Varma

Written by Ashish P. Verma

Cast Vidyut Jammwal(Vivaan Ahuja). Neha Dhupia(ACP Jayati Bharghav). Rukmini Maitra(Anshika Maitra). Chandan Roy Sanyal(Captain Saju). Ivy Haralson(Taira). Chandan Roy(Riyaz Ahmed). Daniele Balconi(Yuri). Arsh Merchant(A Hostage).Joynal. Vaibhav Sharma(Vidyut’s Friend). Du Au(Chad). Prahan Rao(Sia husband)

Language Hindi

Producers Ravichand Nallappa. Aashin A. Shah. Vipul Amrutlal Shah.

Production Sunshine Pictures.. Zee Studios
